CustomField.description: If this is selected, the investor payment's fees is included in calculating the service fees for the platform. If this is not selected the service fees is not calculated on the Fee component of investor payment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is selected, the investor payment's fees is included in calculating the service fees for the platform. If this is not selected the service fees is not calculated on the Fee component of investor payment.
CustomField.label: Collect Service Fees on Fees
